fields.Chapter Title: <span style="font-size:12pt;">“Defenders of Faith: Rhetoric and the Politics of Science in Law”</span><span style="font-size:medium;"></span>
fields.Book Title: William Jennings Bryan: A Centennial Retrospective
fields.Description/Abstract: Book Chapter comparing William Jennings summation in the Scopes trial to the Alabama Supreme Court Decision about IVF embryos that came out in February 2024. The chapter analyzes the religious arguments used and demonstrates how Christian faith continues to infuse American law, despite its purported secular and pluralistic underpinnings.
